course_name: Whole of Process Optimisation and Control
description: (First offered 2013) This course considers how existing processes are optimised with particular emphasis on how advanced control structures (e.g. equation based control etc) Can be used to deliver better outcomes. Students will be able to model the benefits (through Aspen or similar) of proposed control structures to justify their use in complex unit operations. Part of the justification will involve consideration of hardware and cost factors in implementing various control structures.
